title: The Chronicles of Tearha: The Number 139
description: Travelling through time, space, and now dimensions, The Watcher arrives on the continent of Eltar of the planet Tearha, chasing the mystery of the number '139'.  As humans encroach on Valendra Forest, Adelaide Wiltkins, a rude elf with a forgotten past, takes up arms to protect her home.  In the meantime, Nadier, a mercenary dark elf, tries to uncover the brewing conspiracy that led to the death of his sworn brother and find vengeance.  All the while, a threat looms from within the bronze walls of the city of Everwind, threatening to engulf the world in a deadly war.
author: Aden Ng
